Event: Found out about your boot camp too late.
Post: "Found out about your boot camp too late because I'm just naturally slow to catch on to good opportunities."

Post: "My cat of 10 years stopped eating and is very sick because I'm just not cut out to be a responsible pet owner."

Post: "I was scared of the girls in the year above me at school because I've just always been inherently intimidated by people who are more mature than me."

Post: "I'm no longer friends with anyone because I'm just naturally bad at maintaining relationships."

My eye still hurts because I'm just prone to getting injured easily, it's always something with me!"
